when you lay your garments aside in the midday heat; and after the evening prayer. These are your three times for privacy; at other times, there is no blame on you or them if you move around each other freely. 57:T86c,يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيْنٍ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى فَاكْتُبُوهُ وَلْيَكْتُب بَّيْنَكُمْ كَاتِبٌ بِالْعَدْلِ وَلَا يَأْبَ كَاتِبٌ أَن يَكْتُبَ كَمَا عَلَّمَهُ اللَّهُ فَلْيَكْتُبْ وَلْيُمْلِلِ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ وَلْيَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ وَلَا يَبْخَسْ مِنْهُ شَيْئًا فَإِن كَانَ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَاسْتَشْهِدُوا شَهِيدَيْنِ مِن رِّجَالِكُمْ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامْرَأَتَانِ مِمَّن تَرْضَوْنَ مِنَ الشُّهَدَاءِ أَن تَضِلَّ إِحْدَاهُمَا فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحْدَاهُمَا الْأُخْرَىٰ وَلَا يَأْبَ الشُّهَدَاءُ إِذَا مَا دُعُوا وَلَا تَسْأَمُوا أَن تَكْتُبُوهُ صَغِيرًا أَوْ كَبِيرًا إِلَىٰ أَجَلِهِ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَقْسَطُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَأَقْوَمُ لِلشَّهَادَةِ وَأَدْنَىٰ أَلَّا تَرْتَابُوا إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ تِجَارَةً حَاضِرَةً تُدِيرُونَهَا بَيْنَكُمْ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَلَّا تَكْتُبُوهَا وَأَشْهِدُوا إِذَا تَبَايَعْتُمْ وَلَا يُضَارَّ كَاتِبٌ وَلَا شَهِيدٌ وَإِن تَفْعَلُوا فَإِنَّهُ فُسُوقٌ بِكُمْ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ58:T4dc,You who believe, when you contract a debt for a stated term, put it down in writing: have a scribe write it down justly between you. No scribe should refuse to write: let him write as God has taught him, let the debtor dictate, and let him fear God, his Lord, and not diminish &#91;the debt&#93; at all. If the debtor is feeble-minded, weak, or unable to dictate, then let his guardian dictate justly. Call in two men as witnesses. If two men are not there, then call one man and two women out of those you approve as witnesses, so that if one of the two women should forget the other can remind her. Let the witnesses not refuse when they are summoned. Do not disdain to write the debt down, be it small or large, along with the time it falls due: this way is more equitable in God&rsquo;s eyes, more reliable as testimony, and more likely to prevent doubts arising between you. But if the merchandise is there and you hand it over, there is no blame on you if you do not write it down. Have witnesses present whenever you trade with one another, and let no harm be done to either scribe or witness, for if you did cause them harm, it would be a crime on your part. Be mindful of God, and He will teach you: He has full knowledge of everything20:["$","$Lb",null,{"whiteSpace":"break-spaces","w":"100%","direction":"column","children":["$","$L56",null,{"id":"ddf0ec6f-a43d-40d3-8898-0d35ac486867","wordgroups":[{"id":"c4d269b9-69c0-45d9-97eb-e90657f2bd26","body":"ولِلمَرْءِ","analyses":[{"id":"b23a8499-cd30-45a9-bcbb-f24853f7fd30","lex":null,"root":"مرأ","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"mra","wordgroup_id":"c4d269b9-69c0-45d9-97eb-e90657f2bd26","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"ddf0ec6f-a43d-40d3-8898-0d35ac486867","order_number":0},{"id":"20853a6b-b7d7-42cf-8059-1f9c7557919d","body":"يَعْتَادُ","analyses":[{"id":"22a21848-3fbc-4e9e-9c88-fafdd21858b6","lex":null,"root":"عود","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"Ewd","wordgroup_id":"20853a6b-b7d7-42cf-8059-1f9c7557919d","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"ddf0ec6f-a43d-40d3-8898-0d35ac486867","order_number":1},{"id":"7e5e93aa-18c6-4162-8472-f59268ca8995","body":"الصَّبابةَ","analyses":[{"id":"192198c1-8b07-4be5-8be6-d04db92d8a12","lex":null,"root":"صبب","gloss":null,"source":"qpip","root_slug":"Sbb","wordgroup_id":"7e5e93aa-18c6-4162-8472-f59268ca8995","root_strength":null}],"organism_id":"ddf0ec6f-a43d-40d3-8898-0d35ac486867","order_number":2}],"analysesMap":{"c4d269b9-69c0-45d9-97eb-e90657f2bd26":[{"id":101653,"root":"مرأ","root_slug":"mra","surah":2,"verse":102,"word_index":41,"arabic_text":"وَاتَّبَعُوا مَا تَتْلُو الشَّيَاطِينُ عَلَىٰ مُلْكِ سُلَيْمَانَ وَمَا كَفَرَ سُلَيْمَانُ وَلَـٰكِنَّ الشَّيَاطِينَ كَفَرُوا يُعَلِّمُونَ النَّاسَ السِّحْرَ وَمَا أُنزِلَ عَلَى الْمَلَكَيْنِ بِبَابِلَ هَارُوتَ وَمَارُوتَ وَمَا يُعَلِّمَانِ مِنْ أَحَدٍ حَتَّىٰ يَقُولَا إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ فِتْنَةٌ فَلَا تَكْفُرْ فَيَتَعَلَّمُونَ مِنْهُمَا مَا يُفَرِّقُونَ بِهِ بَيْنَ الْمَرْءِ وَزَوْجِهِ وَمَا هُم بِضَارِّينَ بِهِ مِنْ أَحَدٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ وَيَتَعَلَّمُونَ مَا يَضُرُّهُمْ وَلَا يَنفَعُهُمْ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمُوا لَمَنِ اشْتَرَاهُ مَا لَهُ فِي الْآخِرَةِ مِنْ خَلَاقٍ وَلَبِئْسَ مَا شَرَوْا بِهِ أَنفُسَهُمْ لَوْ كَانُوا يَعْلَمُونَ","translation_text":"and followed what the evil ones had fabricated about the Kingdom of Solomon instead. Not that Solomon himself was a disbeliever; it was the evil ones who were disbelievers. They taught people witchcraft and what was revealed in Babylon to the two angels Harut and Marut. Yet these two never taught anyone without first warning him, &lsquo;We are sent only to tempt- do not disbelieve.&rsquo; From these two, they learned what can cause discord between man and wife, although they harm no one with it except by God&rsquo;s leave. They learned what harmed them, not what benefited them, knowing full well that whoever gained &#91;this knowledge&#93; would lose any share in the Hereafter. Evil indeed is the &#91;price&#93; for which they sold their souls, if only they knew","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"b23a8499-cd30-45a9-bcbb-f24853f7fd30","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"مرأ","wordgroup_id":"c4d269b9-69c0-45d9-97eb-e90657f2bd26"},{"id":104337,"root":"مرأ","root_slug":"mra","surah":2,"verse":282,"word_index":61,"arabic_text":"$57","translation_text":"$58","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"b23a8499-cd30-45a9-bcbb-f24853f7fd30","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"مرأ","wordgroup_id":"c4d269b9-69c0-45d9-97eb-e90657f2bd26"},{"id":104860,"root":"مرأ","root_slug":"mra","surah":3,"verse":35,"word_index":3,"arabic_text":"إِذْ قَالَتِ امْرَأَتُ عِمْرَانَ رَبِّ إِنِّي نَذَرْتُ لَكَ مَا فِي بَطْنِي مُحَرَّرًا فَتَقَبَّلْ مِنِّي إِنَّكَ أَنتَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ","translation_text":"Imran&rsquo;s wife said, &lsquo;Lord, I have dedicated what is growing in my womb entirely to You; so accept this from me. if they have children, you inherit a quarter. &#91;In all cases, the distribution comes&#93; after payment of any bequests or debts. If you have no children, your wives&rsquo; share is a quarter; if you have children, your wives get an eighth. &#91;In all cases, the distribution comes&#93; after payment of any bequests or debts. If a man or a woman dies leaving no children or parents, but a single brother or sister, he or she should take one-sixth of the inheritance; if there are more siblings, they share one-third between them. &#91;In all cases, the distribution comes&#93; after payment of any bequests or debts, with no harm done to anyone: this is a commandment from God: God is all knowing and benign to all","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"b23a8499-cd30-45a9-bcbb-f24853f7fd30","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"مرأ","wordgroup_id":"c4d269b9-69c0-45d9-97eb-e90657f2bd26"},{"id":108598,"root":"مرأ","root_slug":"mra","surah":4,"verse":128,"word_index":2,"arabic_text":"وَإِنِ امْرَأَةٌ خَافَتْ مِن بَعْلِهَا نُشُوزًا أَوْ إِعْرَاضًا فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا أَن يُصْلِحَا بَيْنَهُمَا صُلْحًا وَالصُّلْحُ خَيْرٌ وَأُحْضِرَتِ الْأَنفُسُ الشُّحَّ وَإِن تُحْسِنُوا وَتَتَّقُوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًا","translation_text":"If a wife fears high-handedness or alienation from her husband, neither of them will be blamed if they come to a peaceful settlement, for peace is best. 59:T86c,يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيْنٍ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى فَاكْتُبُوهُ وَلْيَكْتُب بَّيْنَكُمْ كَاتِبٌ بِالْعَدْلِ وَلَا يَأْبَ كَاتِبٌ أَن يَكْتُبَ كَمَا عَلَّمَهُ اللَّهُ فَلْيَكْتُبْ وَلْيُمْلِلِ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ وَلْيَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ وَلَا يَبْخَسْ مِنْهُ شَيْئًا فَإِن كَانَ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَاسْتَشْهِدُوا شَهِيدَيْنِ مِن رِّجَالِكُمْ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامْرَأَتَانِ مِمَّن تَرْضَوْنَ مِنَ الشُّهَدَاءِ أَن تَضِلَّ إِحْدَاهُمَا فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحْدَاهُمَا الْأُخْرَىٰ وَلَا يَأْبَ الشُّهَدَاءُ إِذَا مَا دُعُوا وَلَا تَسْأَمُوا أَن تَكْتُبُوهُ صَغِيرًا أَوْ كَبِيرًا إِلَىٰ أَجَلِهِ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَقْسَطُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَأَقْوَمُ لِلشَّهَادَةِ وَأَدْنَىٰ أَلَّا تَرْتَابُوا إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ تِجَارَةً حَاضِرَةً تُدِيرُونَهَا بَيْنَكُمْ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَلَّا تَكْتُبُوهَا وَأَشْهِدُوا إِذَا تَبَايَعْتُمْ وَلَا يُضَارَّ كَاتِبٌ وَلَا شَهِيدٌ وَإِن تَفْعَلُوا فَإِنَّهُ فُسُوقٌ بِكُمْ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ5a:T4dc,You who believe, when you contract a debt for a stated term, put it down in writing: have a scribe write it down justly between you. No scribe should refuse to write: let him write as God has taught him, let the debtor dictate, and let him fear God, his Lord, and not diminish &#91;the debt&#93; at all. If the debtor is feeble-minded, weak, or unable to dictate, then let his guardian dictate justly. Call in two men as witnesses. If two men are not there, then call one man and two women out of those you approve as witnesses, so that if one of the two women should forget the other can remind her. Let the witnesses not refuse when they are summoned. Do not disdain to write the debt down, be it small or large, along with the time it falls due: this way is more equitable in God&rsquo;s eyes, more reliable as testimony, and more likely to prevent doubts arising between you. But if the merchandise is there and you hand it over, there is no blame on you if you do not write it down. Have witnesses present whenever you trade with one another, and let no harm be done to either scribe or witness, for if you did cause them harm, it would be a crime on your part. Be mindful of God, and He will teach you: He has full knowledge of No one should be burdened with more than they can bear: no mother shall be made to suffer harm on account of her child, nor any father on account of his. The same duty is incumbent on the father&rsquo;s heir. If, by mutual consent and consultation, the couple wish to wean &#91;the child&#93;, they will not be blamed, nor will there be any blame if you wish to engage a wet nurse, provided you pay as agreed in a fair manner. بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَأَدَاءٌ إِلَيْهِ بِإِحْسَانٍ ذَٰلِكَ تَخْفِيفٌ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَرَحْمَةٌ فَمَنِ اعْتَدَىٰ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَلَهُ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ","translation_text":"You who believe, fair retribution is prescribed for you in cases of murder: the free man for the free man, the slave for the slave, the female for the female. But if the culprit is pardoned by his aggrieved brother, this shall be adhered to fairly, and the culprit shall pay what is due in a good way. This is an alleviation from your Lord and an act of mercy. Wives have &#91;rights&#93; similar to their &#91;obligations&#93;, according to what is recognized to be fair, and husbands have a degree &#91;of right&#93; over them: &#91;both should remember that&#93; God is almighty and wise","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"fdf17c42-4272-439e-b0cf-633cdda9f596","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"عرف","wordgroup_id":"16f0cdb4-7418-4ad8-9adb-665039fecc48"},{"id":103353,"root":"عرف","root_slug":"Erf","surah":2,"verse":229,"word_index":4,"arabic_text":"الطَّلَاقُ مَرَّتَانِ فَإِمْسَاكٌ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ تَسْرِيحٌ بِإِحْسَانٍ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ أَن تَأْخُذُوا مِمَّا آتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ شَيْئًا إِلَّا أَن يَخَافَا أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا فِيمَا افْتَدَتْ بِهِ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَعْتَدُوهَا وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ","translation_text":"Divorce can happen twice, and &#91;each time&#93; wives either be kept on in an acceptable manner or released in a good way. It is not lawful for you to take back anything that you have given &#91;your wives&#93;, except where both fear that they cannot maintain &#91;the marriage&#93; within the bounds set by God: if you &#91;arbiters&#93; suspect that the couple may not be able to do this, then there will be no blame on either of them if the woman opts to give something for her release. These are the bounds set by God: do not overstep them. It is those who overstep God&rsquo;s bounds who are doing wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"fdf17c42-4272-439e-b0cf-633cdda9f596","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"عرف","wordgroup_id":"16f0cdb4-7418-4ad8-9adb-665039fecc48"},{"id":103400,"root":"عرف","root_slug":"Erf","surah":2,"verse":231,"word_index":7,"arabic_text":"وَإِذَا طَلَّقْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ فَبَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَأَمْسِكُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ سَرِّحُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ وَلَا تُمْسِكُوهُنَّ ضِرَارًا لِّتَعْتَدُوا وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ فَقَدْ ظَلَمَ نَفْسَهُ وَلَا تَتَّخِذُوا آيَاتِ اللَّهِ هُزُوًا وَاذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَمَا أَنزَلَ عَلَيْكُم مِّنَ الْكِتَابِ وَالْحِكْمَةِ يَعِظُكُم بِهِ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ","translation_text":"When you divorce women and they have reached their set time, then either keep or release them in a fair manner. Do not hold on to them with intent to harm them and commit aggression: anyone who does this wrongs himself. Do not make a mockery of God&rsquo;s revelations; remember the favour He blessed you with, and the Scripture and wisdom He sent to teach you. Be mindful of God and know that He has full knowledge of everything","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"fdf17c42-4272-439e-b0cf-633cdda9f596","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"عرف","wordgroup_id":"16f0cdb4-7418-4ad8-9adb-665039fecc48"},{"id":103402,"root":"عرف","root_slug":"Erf","surah":2,"verse":231,"word_index":10,"arabic_text":"وَإِذَا طَلَّقْتُمُ النِّسَاءَ فَبَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَأَمْسِكُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ سَرِّحُوهُنَّ بِمَعْرُوفٍ وَلَا تُمْسِكُوهُنَّ ضِرَارًا لِّتَعْتَدُوا وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ فَقَدْ ظَلَمَ نَفْسَهُ وَلَا تَتَّخِذُوا آيَاتِ اللَّهِ هُزُوًا وَاذْكُرُوا نِعْمَتَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَمَا أَنزَلَ عَلَيْكُم مِّنَ الْكِتَابِ وَالْحِكْمَةِ يَعِظُكُم بِهِ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ","translation_text":"When you divorce women and they have reached their set time, then either keep or release them in a fair manner. Let those of you who believe in God and the Last Day take this to heart: that is more wholesome and purer for you. God knows and you do not","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"fdf17c42-4272-439e-b0cf-633cdda9f596","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"عرف","wordgroup_id":"16f0cdb4-7418-4ad8-9adb-665039fecc48"},{"id":103481,"root":"عرف","root_slug":"Erf","surah":2,"verse":233,"word_index":56,"arabic_text":"وَالْوَالِدَاتُ يُرْضِعْنَ أَوْلَادَهُنَّ حَوْلَيْنِ كَامِلَيْنِ لِمَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يُتِمَّ الرَّضَاعَةَ وَعَلَى الْمَوْلُودِ لَهُ رِزْقُهُنَّ وَكِسْوَتُهُنَّ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ لَا تُكَلَّفُ نَفْسٌ إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا لَا تُضَارَّ وَالِدَةٌ بِوَلَدِهَا وَلَا مَوْلُودٌ لَّهُ بِوَلَدِهِ وَعَلَى الْوَارِثِ مِثْلُ ذَٰلِكَ فَإِنْ أَرَادَا فِصَالًا عَن تَرَاضٍ مِّنْهُمَا وَتَشَاوُرٍ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا وَإِنْ أَرَدتُّمْ أَن تَسْتَرْضِعُوا أَوْلَادَكُمْ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِذَا سَلَّمْتُم مَّا آتَيْتُم بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ","translation_text":"Mothers suckle their children for two whole years, if they wish to complete the term, and clothing and maintenance must be borne by the father in a fair manner. No one should be burdened with more than they can bear: no mother shall be made to suffer harm on account of her child, nor any father on account of his. The same duty is incumbent on the father&rsquo;s heir. If, by mutual consent and consultation, the couple wish to wean &#91;the child&#93;, they will not be blamed, nor will there be any blame if you wish to engage a wet nurse, provided you pay as agreed in a fair manner. Be mindful of God, knowing that He sees everything you do","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"fdf17c42-4272-439e-b0cf-633cdda9f596","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"عرف","wordgroup_id":"16f0cdb4-7418-4ad8-9adb-665039fecc48"},{"id":103459,"root":"عرف","root_slug":"Erf","surah":2,"verse":233,"word_index":16,"arabic_text":"وَالْوَالِدَاتُ يُرْضِعْنَ أَوْلَادَهُنَّ حَوْلَيْنِ كَامِلَيْنِ لِمَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يُتِمَّ الرَّضَاعَةَ وَعَلَى الْمَوْلُودِ لَهُ رِزْقُهُنَّ وَكِسْوَتُهُنَّ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ لَا تُكَلَّفُ نَفْسٌ إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا لَا تُضَارَّ وَالِدَةٌ بِوَلَدِهَا وَلَا مَوْلُودٌ لَّهُ بِوَلَدِهِ وَعَلَى الْوَارِثِ مِثْلُ ذَٰلِكَ فَإِنْ أَرَادَا فِصَالًا عَن تَرَاضٍ مِّنْهُمَا وَتَشَاوُرٍ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا وَإِنْ أَرَدتُّمْ أَن تَسْتَرْضِعُوا أَوْلَادَكُمْ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ إِذَا سَلَّمْتُم مَّا آتَيْتُم بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ","translation_text":"Mothers suckle their children for two whole years, if they wish to complete the term, and clothing and maintenance must be borne by the father in a fair manner. No one should be burdened with more than they can bear: no mother shall be made to suffer harm on account of her child, nor any father on account of his. The same duty is incumbent on the father&rsquo;s heir. If, by mutual consent and consultation, the couple wish to wean &#91;the child&#93;, they will not be blamed, nor will there be any blame if you wish to engage a wet nurse, provided you pay as agreed in a fair manner. Be mindful of God, knowing that He sees everything you do","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"fdf17c42-4272-439e-b0cf-633cdda9f596","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"عرف","wordgroup_id":"16f0cdb4-7418-4ad8-9adb-665039fecc48"},{"id":103501,"root":"عرف","root_slug":"Erf","surah":2,"verse":234,"word_index":21,"arabic_text":"وَالَّذِينَ يُتَوَفَّوْنَ مِنكُمْ وَيَذَرُونَ أَزْوَاجًا يَتَرَبَّصْنَ بِأَنفُسِهِنَّ أَرْبَعَةَ أَشْهُرٍ وَعَشْرًا فَإِذَا بَلَغْنَ أَجَلَهُنَّ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِيمَا فَعَلْنَ فِي أَنفُسِهِنَّ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ","translation_text":"If any of you die and leave widows, the widows should wait for four months and ten nights before remarrying. When they have completed this set time, you will not be blamed for anything they may reasonably choose to do with themselves. Remember that God knows what is in your souls, so be mindful of Him. If you are prevented &#91;from doing so&#93;, then &#91;send&#93; whatever offering for sacrifice you can afford, and do not shave your headsuntil the offering has reached the place of sacrifice. If any of you is ill, or has an ailment of the scalp, he should compensate by fasting, or feeding the poor, or offering sacrifice. When you are in safety, anyone wishing to take a break between the minor pilgrimage and the major one must make whatever offering he can afford. If he lacks the means, he should fast for three days during the pilgrimage, and seven days on his return, making ten days in all. This applies to those whose household is not near the Sacred Mosque. If any of you is ill, or has an ailment of the scalp, he should compensate by fasting, or feeding the poor, or offering sacrifice. When you are in safety, anyone wishing to take a break between the minor pilgrimage and the major one must make whatever offering he can afford. If he lacks the means, he should fast for three days during the pilgrimage, and seven days on his return, making ten days in all. This applies to those whose household is not near the Sacred Mosque. nor if you are in a state of major ritual impurity- though you may pass through the mosque- not until you have bathed; if you are ill, on a journey, have relieved yourselves, or had intercourse, and cannot find any water, then find some clean sand and wipe your faces and hands with it. God is always ready to pardon and forgive","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"2a27f48e-2897-4d0f-be7a-52742141dab2","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"يدي","wordgroup_id":"dd599d3b-924c-4d6d-bffa-e06bc7f8366a"},{"id":107690,"root":"يدي","root_slug":"ydy","surah":4,"verse":62,"word_index":7,"arabic_text":"فَكَيْفَ إِذَا أَصَابَتْهُم مُّصِيبَةٌ بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيهِمْ ثُمَّ جَاءُوكَ يَحْلِفُونَ بِاللَّهِ إِنْ أَرَدْنَا إِلَّا إِحْسَانًا وَتَوْفِيقًا","translation_text":"If disaster strikes them because of what they themselves have done, then they will come to you, swearing by God, &lsquo;We only wanted to do good and achieve harmony.&rsquo;","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"2a27f48e-2897-4d0f-be7a-52742141dab2","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"يدي","wordgroup_id":"dd599d3b-924c-4d6d-bffa-e06bc7f8366a"},{"id":107849,"root":"يدي","root_slug":"ydy","surah":4,"verse":77,"word_index":8,"arabic_text":"أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى الَّذِينَ قِيلَ لَهُمْ كُفُّوا أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ فَلَمَّا كُتِبَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقِتَالُ إِذَا فَرِيقٌ مِّنْهُمْ يَخْشَوْنَ النَّاسَ كَخَشْيَةِ اللَّهِ أَوْ أَشَدَّ خَشْيَةً وَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا لِمَ كَتَبْتَ عَلَيْنَا الْقِتَالَ لَوْلَا أَخَّرْتَنَا إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ قَرِيبٍ قُلْ مَتَاعُ الدُّنْيَا قَلِيلٌ وَالْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لِّمَنِ اتَّقَىٰ وَلَا تُظْلَمُونَ فَتِيلًا","translation_text":"&#91;Prophet&#93;, do you not see those who were told, &lsquo;Restrain yourselves from fighting, perform the prayer, and pay the prescribed alms&rsquo;? When fighting was ordained for them, some of them feared men as much as, or even more than, they feared God, saying, &lsquo;Lord, why have You ordained fighting for us? If only You would give us just a little more time.&rsquo; Say to them, &lsquo;Little is the enjoyment in this world, the Hereafter is far better for those who are mindful of God: you will not be wronged by as much as the fibre in a date stone","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"2a27f48e-2897-4d0f-be7a-52742141dab2","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"يدي","wordgroup_id":"dd599d3b-924c-4d6d-bffa-e06bc7f8366a"},{"id":108081,"root":"يدي","root_slug":"ydy","surah":4,"verse":91,"word_index":22,"arabic_text":"سَتَجِدُونَ آخَرِينَ يُرِيدُونَ أَن يَأْمَنُوكُمْ وَيَأْمَنُوا قَوْمَهُمْ كُلَّ مَا رُدُّوا إِلَى الْفِتْنَةِ أُرْكِسُوا فِيهَا فَإِن لَّمْ يَعْتَزِلُوكُمْ وَيُلْقُوا إِلَيْكُمُ السَّلَمَ وَيَكُفُّوا أَيْدِيَهُمْ فَخُذُوهُمْ وَاقْتُلُوهُمْ حَيْثُ ثَقِفْتُمُوهُمْ وَأُولَـٰئِكُمْ جَعَلْنَا لَكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ سُلْطَانًا مُّبِينًا","translation_text":"You will find others who wish to be safe from you, and from their own people, but whenever they are back in a situation where they are tempted &#91;to fight you&#93;, they succumb to it. If they come to you as captives, you still pay to set them free, although you had no right to drive them out. So do you believe in some parts of the Scripture and not in others? God will not speak to them on the Day of Resurrection, nor will He purify them: an agonizing torment awaits them","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"a6f5488c-7c04-459f-9900-4a4271b78039","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"6d9ddca4-b5e0-4249-914e-af7977d0eb5b"},{"id":102556,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":177,"word_index":32,"arabic_text":"لَّيْسَ الْبِرَّ أَن تُوَلُّوا وُجُوهَكُمْ قِبَلَ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ الْبِرَّ مَنْ آمَنَ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَالْمَلَائِكَةِ وَالْكِتَابِ وَالنَّبِيِّينَ وَآتَى الْمَالَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ ذَوِي الْقُرْبَىٰ وَالْيَتَامَىٰ وَالْمَسَاكِينَ وَابْنَ السَّبِيلِ وَالسَّائِلِينَ وَفِي الرِّقَابِ وَأَقَامَ الصَّلَاةَ وَآتَى الزَّكَاةَ وَالْمُوفُونَ بِعَهْدِهِمْ إِذَا عَاهَدُوا وَالصَّابِرِينَ فِي الْبَأْسَاءِ وَالضَّرَّاءِ وَحِينَ الْبَأْسِ أُولَـٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ صَدَقُوا وَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُتَّقُونَ","translation_text":"Goodness does not consist in turning your face towards East or West. The truly good are those who believe in God and the Last Day, in the angels, the Scripture, and the prophets; who give away some of their wealth, however much they cherish it, to their relatives, to orphans, the needy, travellers and beggars, and to liberate those in bondage; those who keep up the prayer and pay the prescribed alms; who keep pledges whenever they make them; who are steadfast in misfortune, adversity, and times of danger. These are the ones who are true, and it is they who are aware of God","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"a6f5488c-7c04-459f-9900-4a4271b78039","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"6d9ddca4-b5e0-4249-914e-af7977d0eb5b"},{"id":103054,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":212,"word_index":14,"arabic_text":"زُيِّنَ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا وَيَسْخَرُونَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَالَّذِينَ اتَّقَوْا فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ وَاللَّهُ يَرْزُقُ مَن يَشَاءُ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ","translation_text":"The life of this world is made to seem glamorous to the disbelievers, and they laugh at those who believe. But those who are mindful of God will be above them on the Day of Resurrection: God provides immeasurably for whoever He pleases","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"a6f5488c-7c04-459f-9900-4a4271b78039","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"6d9ddca4-b5e0-4249-914e-af7977d0eb5b"},{"id":103093,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":213,"word_index":49,"arabic_text":"كَانَ النَّاسُ أُمَّةً وَاحِدَةً فَبَعَثَ اللَّهُ النَّبِيِّينَ مُبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنذِرِينَ وَأَنزَلَ مَعَهُمُ الْكِتَابَ بِالْحَقِّ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ فِيمَا اخْتَلَفُوا فِيهِ وَمَا اخْتَلَفَ فِيهِ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ أُوتُوهُ مِن بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَاتُ بَغْيًا بَيْنَهُمْ فَهَدَى اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لِمَا اخْتَلَفُوا فِيهِ مِنَ الْحَقِّ بِإِذْنِهِ وَاللَّهُ يَهْدِي مَن يَشَاءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ","translation_text":"Mankind was a single community, then God sent prophets to bring good news and warning, and with them He sent the Scripture with the Truth, to judge between people in their disagreements. It was only those to whom it was given who disagreed about it after clear signs had come to them, because of rivalry between them. So by His leave God guided the believers to the truth they had differed about: God guides whoever He will to a straight path","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"a6f5488c-7c04-459f-9900-4a4271b78039","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"6d9ddca4-b5e0-4249-914e-af7977d0eb5b"},{"id":103365,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":229,"word_index":26,"arabic_text":"الطَّلَاقُ مَرَّتَانِ فَإِمْسَاكٌ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ تَسْرِيحٌ بِإِحْسَانٍ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ أَن تَأْخُذُوا مِمَّا آتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ شَيْئًا إِلَّا أَن يَخَافَا أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا فِيمَا افْتَدَتْ بِهِ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَعْتَدُوهَا وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ","translation_text":"Divorce can happen twice, and &#91;each time&#93; wives either be kept on in an acceptable manner or released in a good way. It is not lawful for you to take back anything that you have given &#91;your wives&#93;, except where both fear that they cannot maintain &#91;the marriage&#93; within the bounds set by God: if you &#91;arbiters&#93; suspect that the couple may not be able to do this, then there will be no blame on either of them if the woman opts to give something for her release. These are the bounds set by God: do not overstep them. It is those who overstep God&rsquo;s bounds who are doing wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"a6f5488c-7c04-459f-9900-4a4271b78039","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"6d9ddca4-b5e0-4249-914e-af7977d0eb5b"},{"id":103361,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":229,"word_index":20,"arabic_text":"الطَّلَاقُ مَرَّتَانِ فَإِمْسَاكٌ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ تَسْرِيحٌ بِإِحْسَانٍ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ أَن تَأْخُذُوا مِمَّا آتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ شَيْئًا إِلَّا أَن يَخَافَا أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا فِيمَا افْتَدَتْ بِهِ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَعْتَدُوهَا وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ","translation_text":"Divorce can happen twice, and &#91;each time&#93; wives either be kept on in an acceptable manner or released in a good way. It is not lawful for you to take back anything that you have given &#91;your wives&#93;, except where both fear that they cannot maintain &#91;the marriage&#93; within the bounds set by God: if you &#91;arbiters&#93; suspect that the couple may not be able to do this, then there will be no blame on either of them if the woman opts to give something for her release. These are the bounds set by God: do not overstep them. It is those who overstep God&rsquo;s bounds who are doing wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"a6f5488c-7c04-459f-9900-4a4271b78039","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"قوم","wordgroup_id":"6d9ddca4-b5e0-4249-914e-af7977d0eb5b"},{"id":103393,"root":"قوم","root_slug":"qwm","surah":2,"verse":230,"word_index":29,"arabic_text":"فَإِن طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا تَحِلُّ لَهُ مِن بَعْدُ حَتَّىٰ تَنكِحَ زَوْجًا غَيْرَهُ فَإِن طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا أَن يَتَرَاجَعَا إِن ظَنَّا أَن يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ يُبَيِّنُهَا لِقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ","translation_text":"If a husband re-divorces his wife after the second divorce, she will not be lawful for him until she has taken another husband; if that one divorces her, there will be no blame if she and the first husband return to one another, provided they feel that they can keep within the bounds set by God. If any of you is sick or on a journey, or has just relieved himself, or had intimate contact with a woman, and can find no water, then take some clean sand and wipe your face and hands with it. If there are only daughters, two or more should share two-thirds of the inheritance, if one, she should have half. Parents inherit a sixth each if the deceased leaves children; if he leaves no children and his parents are his sole heirs, his mother has a third, unless he has brothers, in which case she has a sixth. &#91;In all cases, the distribution comes&#93; after payment of any bequests or debts. You cannot know which of your parents or your children is more beneficial to you: this is a law from God, and He is all knowing, all wise","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"4c68557d-13f0-4767-983c-ed2b6425e811","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ثني","wordgroup_id":"1be3d791-9f0e-4a74-b405-c5e1eef6c0f4"},{"id":109209,"root":"ثني","root_slug":"Vny","surah":4,"verse":176,"word_index":28,"arabic_text":"يَسْتَفْتُونَكَ قُلِ اللَّهُ يُفْتِيكُمْ فِي الْكَلَالَةِ إِنِ امْرُؤٌ هَلَكَ لَيْسَ لَهُ وَلَدٌ وَلَهُ أُخْتٌ فَلَهَا نِصْفُ مَا تَرَكَ وَهُوَ يَرِثُهَا إِن لَّمْ يَكُن لَّهَا وَلَدٌ فَإِن كَانَتَا اثْنَتَيْنِ فَلَهُمَا الثُّلُثَانِ مِمَّا تَرَكَ وَإِن كَانُوا إِخْوَةً رِّجَالًا وَنِسَاءً فَلِلذَّكَرِ مِثْلُ حَظِّ الْأُنثَيَيْنِ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ أَن تَضِلُّوا وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ","translation_text":"They ask you &#91;Prophet&#93; for a ruling. Say, &lsquo;God gives you a ruling about inheritance from someone who dies childless with no surviving parents. If a man leaves a sister, she is entitled to half of the inheritance; if she has no child her brother is her sole heir; if there are two sisters, they are entitled to two-thirds of the inheritance between them, but if there are surviving brothers and sisters, the male is entitled to twice the share of the female. God makes this clear to you so that you do not make mistakes: He has full knowledge of everything.&rsquo;","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"4c68557d-13f0-4767-983c-ed2b6425e811","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ثني","wordgroup_id":"1be3d791-9f0e-4a74-b405-c5e1eef6c0f4"},{"id":109475,"root":"ثني","root_slug":"Vny","surah":5,"verse":12,"word_index":9,"arabic_text":"وَلَقَدْ أَخَذَ اللَّهُ مِيثَاقَ بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ وَبَعَثْنَا مِنْهُمُ اثْنَيْ عَشَرَ نَقِيبًا وَقَالَ اللَّهُ إِنِّي مَعَكُمْ لَئِنْ أَقَمْتُمُ الصَّلَاةَ وَآتَيْتُمُ الزَّكَاةَ وَآمَنتُم بِرُسُلِي وَعَزَّرْتُمُوهُمْ وَأَقْرَضْتُمُ اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا لَّأُكَفِّرَنَّ عَنكُمْ سَيِّئَاتِكُمْ وَلَأُدْخِلَنَّكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ فَمَن كَفَرَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ مِنكُمْ فَقَدْ ضَلَّ سَوَاءَ السَّبِيلِ","translation_text":"God took a pledge from the Children of Israel. We made twelve leaders arise among them, and God said, &lsquo;I am with you: if you keep up the prayer, pay the prescribed alms, believe in My messengers and support them, and lend God a good loan, I will wipe out your sins and admit you into Gardens graced with flowing streams. Any of you who now ignore this &#91;pledge&#93; will be far from the right path.&rsquo;","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"4c68557d-13f0-4767-983c-ed2b6425e811","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ثني","wordgroup_id":"1be3d791-9f0e-4a74-b405-c5e1eef6c0f4"},{"id":110823,"root":"ثني","root_slug":"Vny","surah":5,"verse":106,"word_index":12,"arabic_text":"يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا شَهَادَةُ بَيْنِكُمْ إِذَا حَضَرَ أَحَدَكُمُ الْمَوْتُ حِينَ الْوَصِيَّةِ اثْنَانِ ذَوَا عَدْلٍ مِّنكُمْ أَوْ آخَرَانِ مِنْ غَيْرِكُمْ إِنْ أَنتُمْ ضَرَبْتُمْ فِي الْأَرْضِ فَأَصَابَتْكُم مُّصِيبَةُ الْمَوْتِ تَحْبِسُونَهُمَا مِن بَعْدِ الصَّلَاةِ فَيُقْسِمَانِ بِاللَّهِ إِنِ ارْتَبْتُمْ لَا نَشْتَرِي بِهِ ثَمَنًا وَلَوْ كَانَ ذَا قُرْبَىٰ وَلَا نَكْتُمُ شَهَادَةَ اللَّهِ إِنَّا إِذًا لَّمِنَ الْآثِمِينَ","translation_text":"You who believe, when death approaches any of you, let two just men from among you act as witnesses to the making of a bequest, or two men from another people if you are journeying in the land when death approaches. Keep the two witnesses back after prayer, if you have any doubts, and make them both swear by God, &lsquo;We will not sell our testimony for any price, even if a close relative is involved. We will not hide God&rsquo;s testimony, for then we should be doing wrong.&rsquo;","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"4c68557d-13f0-4767-983c-ed2b6425e811","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ثني","wordgroup_id":"1be3d791-9f0e-4a74-b405-c5e1eef6c0f4"},{"id":112660,"root":"ثني","root_slug":"Vny","surah":6,"verse":143,"word_index":5,"arabic_text":"ثَمَانِيَةَ أَزْوَاجٍ مِّنَ الضَّأْنِ اثْنَيْنِ وَمِنَ الْمَعْزِ اثْنَيْنِ قُلْ آلذَّكَرَيْنِ حَرَّمَ أَمِ الْأُنثَيَيْنِ أَمَّا اشْتَمَلَتْ عَلَيْهِ أَرْحَامُ الْأُنثَيَيْنِ نَبِّئُونِي بِعِلْمٍ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ","translation_text":"&#91;God gave you&#93; eight animals, in &#91;four&#93; pairs: a pair of sheep and a pair of goats- ask them &#91;Prophet&#93;, &lsquo;Has He forbidden the two males, the two females, or the young in the wombs of the two females? If any of you is sick or on a journey, or has just relieved himself, or had intimate contact with a woman, and can find no water, then take some clean sand and wipe your face and hands with it. God does not wish to place any burden on you: He only wishes to cleanse you and perfect His blessing on you, so that you may be thankful","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"dbe33f47-c7bc-4f2a-90f2-8768469149d4","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"موه","wordgroup_id":"c5c1742c-659e-4e23-aad5-09263870fe1f"},{"id":112115,"root":"موه","root_slug":"mwh","surah":6,"verse":99,"word_index":6,"arabic_text":"وَهُوَ الَّذِي أَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِ نَبَاتَ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ فَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهُ خَضِرًا نُّخْرِجُ مِنْهُ حَبًّا مُّتَرَاكِبًا وَمِنَ النَّخْلِ مِن طَلْعِهَا قِنْوَانٌ دَانِيَةٌ وَجَنَّاتٍ مِّنْ أَعْنَابٍ وَالزَّيْتُونَ وَالرُّمَّانَ مُشْتَبِهًا وَغَيْرَ مُتَشَابِهٍ انظُرُوا إِلَىٰ ثَمَرِهِ إِذَا أَثْمَرَ وَيَنْعِهِ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكُمْ لَآيَاتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ","translation_text":"It is He who sends down water from the sky. With it We produce the shoots of each plant, then bring greenery from it, and from that We bring out grains, one riding on the other in close-packed rows. From the date palm come clusters of low-hanging dates, and there are gardens of vines, olives, and pomegranates, alike yet different. Watch their fruits as they grow and ripen! In all this there are signs for those who would believe","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"dbe33f47-c7bc-4f2a-90f2-8768469149d4","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"موه","wordgroup_id":"c5c1742c-659e-4e23-aad5-09263870fe1f"},{"id":113502,"root":"موه","root_slug":"mwh","surah":7,"verse":50,"word_index":10,"arabic_text":"وَنَادَىٰ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ أَنْ أَفِيضُوا عَلَيْنَا مِنَ الْمَاءِ أَوْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ قَالُوا إِنَّ اللَّهَ حَرَّمَهُمَا عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ","translation_text":"The people of the Fire will call to the people of Paradise, &lsquo;Give us some water, or any of the sustenance God has granted you!&rsquo; and they will reply, &lsquo;God has forbidden both to the disbelievers","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"dbe33f47-c7bc-4f2a-90f2-8768469149d4","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"موه","wordgroup_id":"c5c1742c-659e-4e23-aad5-09263870fe1f"},{"id":113611,"root":"موه","root_slug":"mwh","surah":7,"verse":57,"word_index":19,"arabic_text":"وَهُوَ الَّذِي يُرْسِلُ الرِّيَاحَ بُشْرًا بَيْنَ يَدَيْ رَحْمَتِهِ حَتَّىٰ إِذَا أَقَلَّتْ سَحَابًا ثِقَالًا سُقْنَاهُ لِبَلَدٍ مَّيِّتٍ فَأَنزَلْنَا بِهِ الْمَاءَ فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِ مِن كُلِّ الثَّمَرَاتِ كَذَٰلِكَ نُخْرِجُ الْمَوْتَىٰ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ","translation_text":"It is God who sends the winds, bearing good news of His coming grace, and when they have gathered up the heavy clouds, We drive them to a dead land where We cause rain to fall, bringing out all kinds of crops, just as We shall bring out the dead. Not that Solomon himself was a disbeliever; it was the evil ones who were disbelievers. They taught people witchcraft and what was revealed in Babylon to the two angels Harut and Marut. Yet these two never taught anyone without first warning him, &lsquo;We are sent only to tempt- do not disbelieve.&rsquo; From these two, they learned what can cause discord between man and wife, although they harm no one with it except by God&rsquo;s leave. They learned what harmed them, not what benefited them, knowing full well that whoever gained &#91;this knowledge&#93; would lose any share in the Hereafter. God was aware that you were betraying yourselves, so He turned to you in mercy and pardoned you: now you can lie with them- seek what God has ordained for you- eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct from the black. Then fast until nightfall. Do not lie with them during the nights of your devotional retreat in the mosques: these are the bounds set by God, so do not go near them. God was aware that you were betraying yourselves, so He turned to you in mercy and pardoned you: now you can lie with them- seek what God has ordained for you- eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct from the black. Then fast until nightfall. Do not lie with them during the nights of your devotional retreat in the mosques: these are the bounds set by God, so do not go near them. If you are prevented &#91;from doing so&#93;, then &#91;send&#93; whatever offering for sacrifice you can afford, and do not shave your headsuntil the offering has reached the place of sacrifice. If any of you is ill, or has an ailment of the scalp, he should compensate by fasting, or feeding the poor, or offering sacrifice. When you are in safety, anyone wishing to take a break between the minor pilgrimage and the major one must make whatever offering he can afford. If he lacks the means, he should fast for three days during the pilgrimage, and seven days on his return, making ten days in all. This applies to those whose household is not near the Sacred Mosque. Always be mindful of God, and be aware that He is stern in His retribution","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"5999d9b7-9604-4ce5-9426-d4a6fc630143","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حلل","wordgroup_id":"79b5f9d7-81b9-4595-a140-b04b7a3ec730"},{"id":103328,"root":"حلل","root_slug":"Hll","surah":2,"verse":228,"word_index":7,"arabic_text":"وَالْمُطَلَّقَاتُ يَتَرَبَّصْنَ بِأَنفُسِهِنَّ ثَلَاثَةَ قُرُوءٍ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَهُنَّ أَن يَكْتُمْنَ مَا خَلَقَ اللَّهُ فِي أَرْحَامِهِنَّ إِن كُنَّ يُؤْمِنَّ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَبُعُولَتُهُنَّ أَحَقُّ بِرَدِّهِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ إِنْ أَرَادُوا إِصْلَاحًا وَلَهُنَّ مِثْلُ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِنَّ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَلِلرِّجَالِ عَلَيْهِنَّ دَرَجَةٌ وَاللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ","translation_text":"Divorced women must wait for three monthly periods before remarrying, and, if they really believe in God and the Last Day, it is not lawful for them to conceal what God has created in their wombs: their husbands would do better to take them back during this period, provided they wish to put things right. It is not lawful for you to take back anything that you have given &#91;your wives&#93;, except where both fear that they cannot maintain &#91;the marriage&#93; within the bounds set by God: if you &#91;arbiters&#93; suspect that the couple may not be able to do this, then there will be no blame on either of them if the woman opts to give something for her release. These are the bounds set by God: do not overstep them. Live with them in accordance with what is fair and kind: if you dislike them, it may well be that you dislike something in which God has put much good","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"5999d9b7-9604-4ce5-9426-d4a6fc630143","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حلل","wordgroup_id":"79b5f9d7-81b9-4595-a140-b04b7a3ec730"},{"id":107136,"root":"حلل","root_slug":"Hll","surah":4,"verse":23,"word_index":37,"arabic_text":"حُرِّمَتْ عَلَيْكُمْ أُمَّهَاتُكُمْ وَبَنَاتُكُمْ وَأَخَوَاتُكُمْ وَعَمَّاتُكُمْ وَخَالَاتُكُمْ وَبَنَاتُ الْأَخِ وَبَنَاتُ الْأُخْتِ وَأُمَّهَاتُكُمُ اللَّاتِي أَرْضَعْنَكُمْ وَأَخَوَاتُكُم مِّنَ الرَّضَاعَةِ وَأُمَّهَاتُ نِسَائِكُمْ وَرَبَائِبُكُمُ اللَّاتِي فِي حُجُورِكُم مِّن نِّسَائِكُمُ اللَّاتِي دَخَلْتُم بِهِنَّ فَإِن لَّمْ تَكُونُوا دَخَلْتُم بِهِنَّ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَحَلَائِلُ أَبْنَائِكُمُ الَّذِينَ مِنْ أَصْلَابِكُمْ وَأَن تَجْمَعُوا بَيْنَ الْأُخْتَيْنِ إِلَّا مَا قَدْ سَلَفَ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا","translation_text":"You are forbidden to take as wives your mothers, daughters, sisters, paternal and maternal aunts, the daughters of brothers and daughters of sisters, your milk-mothers and milk-sisters, your wives&rsquo; mothers, the stepdaughters in your care- those born of women with whom you have consummated marriage, if you have not consummated the marriage, then you will not be blamed- wives of your begotten sons, two sisters simultaneously- with the exception of what is past: God is most forgiving and merciful","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"5999d9b7-9604-4ce5-9426-d4a6fc630143","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حلل","wordgroup_id":"79b5f9d7-81b9-4595-a140-b04b7a3ec730"},{"id":107153,"root":"حلل","root_slug":"Hll","surah":4,"verse":24,"word_index":11,"arabic_text":"وَالْمُحْصَنَاتُ مِنَ النِّسَاءِ إِلَّا مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَانُكُمْ كِتَابَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَأُحِلَّ لَكُم مَّا وَرَاءَ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَن تَبْتَغُوا بِأَمْوَالِكُم مُّحْصِنِينَ غَيْرَ مُسَافِحِينَ فَمَا اسْتَمْتَعْتُم بِهِ مِنْهُنَّ فَآتُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ فَرِيضَةً وَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِيمَا تَرَاضَيْتُم بِهِ مِن بَعْدِ الْفَرِيضَةِ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا","translation_text":"women already married, other than your slaves.God has ordained all this for you. Other women are lawful to you, so long as you seek them in marriage, with gifts from your property, looking for wedlock rather than fornication. If you wish to enjoy women through marriage, give them their bride-gift- this is obligatory- though if you should choose mutually, after fulfilling this obligation, to do otherwise &#91;with the bride-gift&#93;, you will not be blamed: God is all knowing and all wise","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"5999d9b7-9604-4ce5-9426-d4a6fc630143","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حلل","wordgroup_id":"79b5f9d7-81b9-4595-a140-b04b7a3ec730"},{"id":109006,"root":"حلل","root_slug":"Hll","surah":4,"verse":160,"word_index":8,"arabic_text":"فَبِظُلْمٍ مِّنَ الَّذِينَ هَادُوا حَرَّمْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ طَيِّبَاتٍ أُحِلَّتْ لَهُمْ وَبِصَدِّهِمْ عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ كَثِيرًا","translation_text":"For the wrongdoings done by the Jews, We forbade them certain good things that had been permitted to them before: for having frequently debarred others from God&rsquo;s path","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"5999d9b7-9604-4ce5-9426-d4a6fc630143","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حلل","wordgroup_id":"79b5f9d7-81b9-4595-a140-b04b7a3ec730"},{"id":109231,"root":"حلل","root_slug":"Hll","surah":5,"verse":1,"word_index":6,"arabic_text":"بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَوْفُوا بِالْعُقُودِ أُحِلَّتْ لَكُم بَهِيمَةُ الْأَنْعَامِ إِلَّا مَا يُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ غَيْرَ مُحِلِّي الصَّيْدِ وَأَنتُمْ حُرُمٌ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَحْكُمُ مَا يُرِيدُ","translation_text":"You who believe, fulfil your obligations. Be mindful of God: He is swift to take account","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"5999d9b7-9604-4ce5-9426-d4a6fc630143","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حلل","wordgroup_id":"79b5f9d7-81b9-4595-a140-b04b7a3ec730"},{"id":109347,"root":"حلل","root_slug":"Hll","surah":5,"verse":5,"word_index":9,"arabic_text":"الْيَوْمَ أُحِلَّ لَكُمُ الطَّيِّبَاتُ وَطَعَامُ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ حِلٌّ لَّكُمْ وَطَعَامُكُمْ حِلٌّ لَّهُمْ وَالْمُحْصَنَاتُ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَالْمُحْصَنَاتُ مِنَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ إِذَا آتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ مُحْصِنِينَ غَيْرَ مُسَافِحِينَ وَلَا مُتَّخِذِي أَخْدَانٍ وَمَن يَكْفُرْ بِالْإِيمَانِ فَقَدْ حَبِطَ عَمَلُهُ وَهُوَ فِي الْآخِرَةِ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ","translation_text":"Today all good things have been made lawful for you. The food of the People of the Book is lawful for you as your food is lawful for them. So are chaste, believing, women as well as chaste women of the people who were given the Scripture before you, as long as you have given them their bride-gifts and married them, not taking them as lovers or secret mistresses. The deeds of anyone who rejects faith will come to nothing, and in the Hereafter he will be one of the losers","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"5999d9b7-9604-4ce5-9426-d4a6fc630143","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حلل","wordgroup_id":"79b5f9d7-81b9-4595-a140-b04b7a3ec730"},{"id":109342,"root":"حلل","root_slug":"Hll","surah":5,"verse":5,"word_index":2,"arabic_text":"الْيَوْمَ أُحِلَّ لَكُمُ الطَّيِّبَاتُ وَطَعَامُ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ حِلٌّ لَّكُمْ وَطَعَامُكُمْ حِلٌّ لَّهُمْ وَالْمُحْصَنَاتُ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَالْمُحْصَنَاتُ مِنَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ إِذَا آتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ مُحْصِنِينَ غَيْرَ مُسَافِحِينَ وَلَا مُتَّخِذِي أَخْدَانٍ وَمَن يَكْفُرْ بِالْإِيمَانِ فَقَدْ حَبِطَ عَمَلُهُ وَهُوَ فِي الْآخِرَةِ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ","translation_text":"Today all good things have been made lawful for you. The food of the People of the Book is lawful for you as your food is lawful for them. So are chaste, believing, women as well as chaste women of the people who were given the Scripture before you, as long as you have given them their bride-gifts and married them, not taking them as lovers or secret mistresses. The deeds of anyone who rejects faith will come to nothing, and in the Hereafter he will be one of the losers","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"5999d9b7-9604-4ce5-9426-d4a6fc630143","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حلل","wordgroup_id":"79b5f9d7-81b9-4595-a140-b04b7a3ec730"}],"c9deddcb-5997-4ccc-9478-5b9e574b1944":[{"id":104233,"root":"سلف","root_slug":"slf","surah":2,"verse":275,"word_index":34,"arabic_text":"الَّذِينَ يَأْكُلُونَ الرِّبَا لَا يَقُومُونَ إِلَّا كَمَا يَقُومُ الَّذِي يَتَخَبَّطُهُ الشَّيْطَانُ مِنَ الْمَسِّ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّمَا الْبَيْعُ مِثْلُ الرِّبَا وَأَحَلَّ اللَّهُ الْبَيْعَ وَحَرَّمَ الرِّبَا فَمَن جَاءَهُ مَوْعِظَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِ فَانتَهَىٰ فَلَهُ مَا سَلَفَ وَأَمْرُهُ إِلَى اللَّهِ وَمَنْ عَادَ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ هُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ","translation_text":"But those who take usury will rise up on the Day of Resurrection like someone tormented by Satan&rsquo;s touch. That is because they say, &lsquo;Trade and usury are the same,&rsquo;","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"0fc019a2-39b7-4b3f-a662-42b37eca9638","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"سلف","wordgroup_id":"c9deddcb-5997-4ccc-9478-5b9e574b1944"},{"id":107107,"root":"سلف","root_slug":"slf","surah":4,"verse":22,"word_index":11,"arabic_text":"وَلَا تَنكِحُوا مَا نَكَحَ آبَاؤُكُم مِّنَ النِّسَاءِ إِلَّا مَا قَدْ سَلَفَ إِنَّهُ كَانَ فَاحِشَةً وَمَقْتًا وَسَاءَ سَبِيلًا","translation_text":"Do not marry women that your fathers married- with the exception of what is past- this is indeed a shameful thing to do, loathsome and leading to evil","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"0fc019a2-39b7-4b3f-a662-42b37eca9638","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"سلف","wordgroup_id":"c9deddcb-5997-4ccc-9478-5b9e574b1944"},{"id":107142,"root":"سلف","root_slug":"slf","surah":4,"verse":23,"word_index":49,"arabic_text":"حُرِّمَتْ عَلَيْكُمْ أُمَّهَاتُكُمْ وَبَنَاتُكُمْ وَأَخَوَاتُكُمْ وَعَمَّاتُكُمْ وَخَالَاتُكُمْ وَبَنَاتُ الْأَخِ وَبَنَاتُ الْأُخْتِ وَأُمَّهَاتُكُمُ اللَّاتِي أَرْضَعْنَكُمْ وَأَخَوَاتُكُم مِّنَ الرَّضَاعَةِ وَأُمَّهَاتُ نِسَائِكُمْ وَرَبَائِبُكُمُ اللَّاتِي فِي حُجُورِكُم مِّن نِّسَائِكُمُ اللَّاتِي دَخَلْتُم بِهِنَّ فَإِن لَّمْ تَكُونُوا دَخَلْتُم بِهِنَّ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَحَلَائِلُ أَبْنَائِكُمُ الَّذِينَ مِنْ أَصْلَابِكُمْ وَأَن تَجْمَعُوا بَيْنَ الْأُخْتَيْنِ إِلَّا مَا قَدْ سَلَفَ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا","translation_text":"You are forbidden to take as wives your mothers, daughters, sisters, paternal and maternal aunts, the daughters of brothers and daughters of sisters, your milk-mothers and milk-sisters, your wives&rsquo; would refuse to believe them","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"1ebc2cc3-5dc2-4300-981f-531826f0b6b0","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"نزل","wordgroup_id":"3954b000-1cf4-46ba-8e03-66815463af7f"},{"id":101643,"root":"نزل","root_slug":"nzl","surah":2,"verse":102,"word_index":18,"arabic_text":"وَاتَّبَعُوا مَا تَتْلُو الشَّيَاطِينُ عَلَىٰ مُلْكِ سُلَيْمَانَ وَمَا كَفَرَ سُلَيْمَانُ وَلَـٰكِنَّ الشَّيَاطِينَ كَفَرُوا يُعَلِّمُونَ النَّاسَ السِّحْرَ وَمَا أُنزِلَ عَلَى الْمَلَكَيْنِ بِبَابِلَ هَارُوتَ وَمَارُوتَ وَمَا يُعَلِّمَانِ مِنْ أَحَدٍ حَتَّىٰ يَقُولَا إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ فِتْنَةٌ فَلَا تَكْفُرْ فَيَتَعَلَّمُونَ مِنْهُمَا مَا يُفَرِّقُونَ بِهِ بَيْنَ الْمَرْءِ وَزَوْجِهِ وَمَا هُم بِضَارِّينَ بِهِ مِنْ أَحَدٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ وَيَتَعَلَّمُونَ مَا يَضُرُّهُمْ وَلَا يَنفَعُهُمْ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمُوا لَمَنِ اشْتَرَاهُ مَا لَهُ فِي الْآخِرَةِ مِنْ خَلَاقٍ وَلَبِئْسَ مَا شَرَوْا بِهِ أَنفُسَهُمْ لَوْ كَانُوا يَعْلَمُونَ","translation_text":"and followed what the evil ones had fabricated about the Kingdom of Solomon instead. Not that Solomon himself was a disbeliever; it was the evil ones who were disbelievers. They taught people witchcraft and what was revealed in Babylon to the two angels Harut and Marut. Yet these two never taught anyone without first warning him, &lsquo;We are sent only to tempt- do not disbelieve.&rsquo; From these two, they learned what can cause discord between man and wife, although they harm no one with it except by God&rsquo;s leave. They learned what harmed them, not what benefited them, knowing full well that whoever gained &#91;this knowledge&#93; would lose any share in the Hereafter. Look at your food and drink: they have not gone bad. In this way God makes His messages clear to you, so that you may reflect on them","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"0787b326-172f-47da-bfc3-5766170e2dbc","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"كلل","wordgroup_id":"a143221b-fa63-45b2-9d3a-179c71423ab4"},{"id":104247,"root":"كلل","root_slug":"kll","surah":2,"verse":276,"word_index":9,"arabic_text":"يَمْحَقُ اللَّهُ الرِّبَا وَيُرْبِي الصَّدَقَاتِ وَاللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ أَثِيمٍ","translation_text":"but God has allowed trade and forbidden usury. Whoever, on receiving God&rsquo;s warning, stops taking usury may keep his past gains- God will be his judge- but whoever goes back to usury will be an inhabitant of the Fire, there to remain. God blights usury, but blesses charitable deeds with multiple increase: He does not love the ungrateful sinner","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"0787b326-172f-47da-bfc3-5766170e2dbc","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"كلل","wordgroup_id":"a143221b-fa63-45b2-9d3a-179c71423ab4"}],"66bbd490-3008-41df-84b1-3ddc2629cfb0":[{"id":101653,"root":"مرأ","root_slug":"mra","surah":2,"verse":102,"word_index":41,"arabic_text":"وَاتَّبَعُوا مَا تَتْلُو الشَّيَاطِينُ عَلَىٰ مُلْكِ سُلَيْمَانَ وَمَا كَفَرَ سُلَيْمَانُ وَلَـٰكِنَّ الشَّيَاطِينَ كَفَرُوا يُعَلِّمُونَ النَّاسَ السِّحْرَ وَمَا أُنزِلَ عَلَى الْمَلَكَيْنِ بِبَابِلَ هَارُوتَ وَمَارُوتَ وَمَا يُعَلِّمَانِ مِنْ أَحَدٍ حَتَّىٰ يَقُولَا إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ فِتْنَةٌ فَلَا تَكْفُرْ فَيَتَعَلَّمُونَ مِنْهُمَا مَا يُفَرِّقُونَ بِهِ بَيْنَ الْمَرْءِ وَزَوْجِهِ وَمَا هُم بِضَارِّينَ بِهِ مِنْ أَحَدٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ وَيَتَعَلَّمُونَ مَا يَضُرُّهُمْ وَلَا يَنفَعُهُمْ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمُوا لَمَنِ اشْتَرَاهُ مَا لَهُ فِي الْآخِرَةِ مِنْ خَلَاقٍ وَلَبِئْسَ مَا شَرَوْا بِهِ أَنفُسَهُمْ لَوْ كَانُوا يَعْلَمُونَ","translation_text":"and followed what the evil ones had fabricated about the Kingdom of Solomon instead. Not that Solomon himself was a disbeliever; it was the evil ones who were disbelievers. They taught people witchcraft and what was revealed in Babylon to the two angels Harut and Marut. Yet these two never taught anyone without first warning him, &lsquo;We are sent only to tempt- do not disbelieve.&rsquo; From these two, they learned what can cause discord between man and wife, although they harm no one with it except by God&rsquo;s leave. They learned what harmed them, not what benefited them, knowing full well that whoever gained &#91;this knowledge&#93; would lose any share in the Hereafter. Evil indeed is the &#91;price&#93; for which they sold their souls, if only they knew","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"13561cc2-8383-449d-8e72-6caa34bd711f","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"مرأ","wordgroup_id":"66bbd490-3008-41df-84b1-3ddc2629cfb0"}],"38516914-6ec7-495a-9d2e-cd6bde1e039d":[{"id":103826,"root":"بيع","root_slug":"byE","surah":2,"verse":254,"word_index":13,"arabic_text":"يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَنفِقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقْنَاكُم مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَ يَوْمٌ لَّا بَيْعٌ فِيهِ وَلَا خُلَّةٌ وَلَا شَفَاعَةٌ وَالْكَافِرُونَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ","translation_text":"You who believe, give from what We have provided for you, before the Day comes when there is no bargaining, no friendship, and no intercession. It is the disbelievers who are wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"5e16c5b3-5dd6-4cea-977e-69e39fa72270","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"بيع","wordgroup_id":"38516914-6ec7-495a-9d2e-cd6bde1e039d"},{"id":104226,"root":"بيع","root_slug":"byE","surah":2,"verse":275,"word_index":23,"arabic_text":"الَّذِينَ يَأْكُلُونَ الرِّبَا لَا يَقُومُونَ إِلَّا كَمَا يَقُومُ الَّذِي يَتَخَبَّطُهُ الشَّيْطَانُ مِنَ الْمَسِّ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّمَا الْبَيْعُ مِثْلُ الرِّبَا وَأَحَلَّ اللَّهُ الْبَيْعَ وَحَرَّمَ الرِّبَا فَمَن جَاءَهُ مَوْعِظَةٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِ فَانتَهَىٰ فَلَهُ مَا سَلَفَ وَأَمْرُهُ إِلَى اللَّهِ وَمَنْ عَادَ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ النَّارِ هُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ","translation_text":"But those who take usury will rise up on the Day of Resurrection like someone tormented by Satan&rsquo;s touch. words: they say, &lsquo;We hear and disobey,&rsquo; and &lsquo;Listen,&rsquo; &#91;adding the insult&#93; &lsquo;May you not hear,&rsquo; and &lsquo;Raina &#91;Look at us&#93;,&rsquo; twisting it abusively with their tongues so as to disparage religion. If they had said, &lsquo;We hear and obey,&rsquo; &lsquo;Listen,&rsquo; and &lsquo;Unzurna &#91;Look at us&#93;,&rsquo; that would have been better and more proper for them. 5b:T86c,يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيْنٍ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى فَاكْتُبُوهُ وَلْيَكْتُب بَّيْنَكُمْ كَاتِبٌ بِالْعَدْلِ وَلَا يَأْبَ كَاتِبٌ أَن يَكْتُبَ كَمَا عَلَّمَهُ اللَّهُ فَلْيَكْتُبْ وَلْيُمْلِلِ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ وَلْيَتَّقِ اللَّهَ رَبَّهُ وَلَا يَبْخَسْ مِنْهُ شَيْئًا فَإِن كَانَ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِ الْحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوْ ضَعِيفًا أَوْ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلْيُمْلِلْ وَلِيُّهُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَاسْتَشْهِدُوا شَهِيدَيْنِ مِن رِّجَالِكُمْ فَإِن لَّمْ يَكُونَا رَجُلَيْنِ فَرَجُلٌ وَامْرَأَتَانِ مِمَّن تَرْضَوْنَ مِنَ الشُّهَدَاءِ أَن تَضِلَّ إِحْدَاهُمَا فَتُذَكِّرَ إِحْدَاهُمَا الْأُخْرَىٰ وَلَا يَأْبَ الشُّهَدَاءُ إِذَا مَا دُعُوا وَلَا تَسْأَمُوا أَن تَكْتُبُوهُ صَغِيرًا أَوْ كَبِيرًا إِلَىٰ أَجَلِهِ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَقْسَطُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَأَقْوَمُ لِلشَّهَادَةِ وَأَدْنَىٰ أَلَّا تَرْتَابُوا إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ تِجَارَةً حَاضِرَةً تُدِيرُونَهَا بَيْنَكُمْ فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَلَّا تَكْتُبُوهَا وَأَشْهِدُوا إِذَا تَبَايَعْتُمْ وَلَا يُضَارَّ كَاتِبٌ وَلَا شَهِيدٌ وَإِن تَفْعَلُوا فَإِنَّهُ فُسُوقٌ بِكُمْ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ5c:T4dc,You who believe, when you contract a debt for a stated term, put it down in writing: have a scribe write it down justly between you. No scribe should refuse to write: let him write as God has taught him, let the debtor dictate, and let him fear God, his Lord, and not diminish &#91;the debt&#93; at all. If the debtor is feeble-minded, weak, or unable to dictate, then let his guardian dictate justly. Call in two men as witnesses. If two men are not there, then call one man and two women out of those you approve as witnesses, so that if one of the two women should forget the other can remind her. Let the witnesses not refuse when they are summoned. Do not disdain to write the debt down, be it small or large, along with the time it falls due: this way is more equitable in God&rsquo;s eyes, more reliable as testimony, and more likely to prevent doubts arising between you. But if the merchandise is there and you hand it over, there is no blame on you if you do not write it down. Have witnesses present whenever you trade with one another, and let no harm be done to either scribe or witness, for if you did cause them harm, it would be a crime on your part. Be mindful of God, and He will teach you: He has full knowledge of Look at your food and drink: they have not gone bad. Look at your donkey- We will make you a sign for the people- look at the bones: see how We bring them together and clothe them with flesh!&rsquo; When all became clear to him, he said, &lsquo;Now I know that God has power over everything.&rsquo;","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"dba12bb0-e7a8-4fdd-9eb1-07e7c7c06f5a","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"كلل","wordgroup_id":"9f0ff361-737a-4d5a-8c3c-64cae628617d"},{"id":103980,"root":"كلل","root_slug":"kll","surah":2,"verse":260,"word_index":27,"arabic_text":"وَإِذْ قَالَ إِبْرَاهِيمُ رَبِّ أَرِنِي كَيْفَ تُحْيِي الْمَوْتَىٰ قَالَ أَوَلَمْ تُؤْمِن قَالَ بَلَىٰ وَلَـٰكِن لِّيَطْمَئِنَّ قَلْبِي قَالَ فَخُذْ أَرْبَعَةً مِّنَ الطَّيْرِ فَصُرْهُنَّ إِلَيْكَ ثُمَّ اجْعَلْ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ جَبَلٍ مِّنْهُنَّ جُزْءًا ثُمَّ ادْعُهُنَّ يَأْتِينَكَ سَعْيًا وَاعْلَمْ أَنَّ اللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ","translation_text":"And when Abraham said, &lsquo;My Lord, show me how You give life to the dead,&rsquo; He said, &lsquo;Do you not believe, then?&rsquo; &lsquo;Yes,&rsquo; said Abraham, &lsquo;but just to put my heart at rest.&rsquo; So God said, &lsquo;Take four birds and train them to come back to you. Haleem","analysis_id":"271b5e14-b19a-4cf8-9477-f88615776466","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حقق","wordgroup_id":"ef8b4a22-f372-41ea-be78-ede2c5af3102"}]}}]}]

If they come to you as captives, you still pay to set them free, although you had no right to drive them out. So do you believe in some parts of the Scripture and not in others? The punishment for those of you who do this will be nothing but disgrace in this life, and on the Day of Resurrection they will be condemned to the harshest torment: God is not unaware of what you do","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"ff0fd352-da49-4612-a381-33cf2db620d8","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حرم","wordgroup_id":"0b599e6c-cc3b-49e7-a45f-22938801d87f"},{"id":102172,"root":"حرم","root_slug":"Hrm","surah":2,"verse":144,"word_index":14,"arabic_text":"قَدْ نَرَىٰ تَقَلُّبَ وَجْهِكَ فِي السَّمَاءِ فَلَنُوَلِّيَنَّكَ قِبْلَةً تَرْضَاهَا فَوَلِّ وَجْهَكَ شَطْرَ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ وَحَيْثُ مَا كُنتُمْ فَوَلُّوا وُجُوهَكُمْ شَطْرَهُ وَإِنَّ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ لَيَعْلَمُونَ أَنَّهُ الْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّهِمْ وَمَا اللَّهُ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا يَعْمَلُونَ","translation_text":"Many a time We have seen you &#91;Prophet&#93; turn your face towards Heaven, so We are turning you towards a prayer direction that pleases you. The truly good are those who believe in God and the Last Day, in the angels, the Scripture, and the prophets; who give away some of their wealth, however much they cherish it, to their relatives, to orphans, the needy, travellers and beggars, and to liberate those in bondage; those who keep up the prayer and pay the prescribed alms; who keep pledges whenever they make them; who are steadfast in misfortune, adversity, and times of danger. These are the ones who are true, and it is they who are aware of God","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"ca54f183-ec62-4fbd-8c3d-437a5a1348e1","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ليس","wordgroup_id":"b62fced9-618c-4e46-a6ea-9d612ed58814"},{"id":102753,"root":"ليس","root_slug":"lys","surah":2,"verse":189,"word_index":9,"arabic_text":"يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ الْأَهِلَّةِ قُلْ هِيَ مَوَاقِيتُ لِلنَّاسِ وَالْحَجِّ وَلَيْسَ الْبِرُّ بِأَن تَأْتُوا الْبُيُوتَ مِن ظُهُورِهَا وَلَـٰكِنَّ الْبِرَّ مَنِ اتَّقَىٰ وَأْتُوا الْبُيُوتَ مِنْ أَبْوَابِهَا وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ","translation_text":"They ask you &#91;Prophet&#93; about crescent moons. The truly good are those who believe in God and the Last Day, in the angels, the Scripture, and the prophets; who give away some of their wealth, however much they cherish it, to their relatives, to orphans, the needy, travellers and beggars, and to liberate those in bondage; those who keep up the prayer and pay the prescribed alms; who keep pledges whenever they make them; who are steadfast in misfortune, adversity, and times of danger. These are the ones who are true, and it is they who are aware of God","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"146c2ff8-e285-4f18-b31b-244ca786f197","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"بني","wordgroup_id":"b5becfde-419a-4100-8e6d-b844a73202f3"},{"id":103033,"root":"بني","root_slug":"bny","surah":2,"verse":211,"word_index":2,"arabic_text":"سَلْ بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ كَمْ آتَيْنَاهُم مِّنْ آيَةٍ بَيِّنَةٍ وَمَن يُبَدِّلْ نِعْمَةَ اللَّهِ مِن بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ شَدِيدُ الْعِقَابِ","translation_text":"&#91;Prophet&#93;, ask the Children of Israel how many clear signs We brought them. If God had so willed, their successors would not have fought each other after they had been brought clear signs. But they disagreed: some believed and some disbelieved. If they come to you as captives, you still pay to set them free, although you had no right to drive them out. So do you believe in some parts of the Scripture and not in others? If they do fight you, kill them- this is what such disbelievers deserve","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"72c20da2-e02d-4a23-90ff-0c4e485727ad","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"شدد","wordgroup_id":"ec8b0c24-7ecb-4776-ab4c-ddb80ed7d005"},{"id":102874,"root":"شدد","root_slug":"Jdd","surah":2,"verse":196,"word_index":72,"arabic_text":"وَأَتِمُّوا الْحَجَّ وَالْعُمْرَةَ لِلَّهِ فَإِنْ أُحْصِرْتُمْ فَمَا اسْتَيْسَرَ مِنَ الْهَدْيِ وَلَا تَحْلِقُوا رُءُوسَكُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَبْلُغَ الْهَدْيُ مَحِلَّهُ فَمَن كَانَ مِنكُم مَّرِيضًا أَوْ بِهِ أَذًى مِّن رَّأْسِهِ فَفِدْيَةٌ مِّن صِيَامٍ أَوْ صَدَقَةٍ أَوْ نُسُكٍ فَإِذَا أَمِنتُمْ فَمَن تَمَتَّعَ بِالْعُمْرَةِ إِلَى الْحَجِّ فَمَا اسْتَيْسَرَ مِنَ الْهَدْيِ فَمَن لَّمْ يَجِدْ فَصِيَامُ ثَلَاثَةِ أَيَّامٍ فِي الْحَجِّ وَسَبْعَةٍ إِذَا رَجَعْتُمْ تِلْكَ عَشَرَةٌ كَامِلَةٌ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَن لَّمْ يَكُنْ أَهْلُهُ حَاضِرِي الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ شَدِيدُ الْعِقَابِ","translation_text":"Complete the pilgrimages, major and minor, for the sake of God. If you are prevented &#91;from doing so&#93;, then &#91;send&#93; whatever offering for sacrifice you can afford, and do not shave your headsuntil the offering has reached the place of sacrifice. If any of you is ill, or has an ailment of the scalp, he should compensate by fasting, or feeding the poor, or offering sacrifice. When you are in safety, anyone wishing to take a break between the minor pilgrimage and the major one must make whatever offering he can afford. If he lacks the means, he should fast for three days during the pilgrimage, and seven days on his return, making ten days in all. This applies to those whose household is not near the Sacred Mosque. Always be mindful of God, and be aware that He is stern in His retribution","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"72c20da2-e02d-4a23-90ff-0c4e485727ad","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"شدد","wordgroup_id":"ec8b0c24-7ecb-4776-ab4c-ddb80ed7d005"},{"id":102927,"root":"شدد","root_slug":"Jdd","surah":2,"verse":200,"word_index":9,"arabic_text":"فَإِذَا قَضَيْتُم مَّنَاسِكَكُمْ فَاذْكُرُوا اللَّهَ كَذِكْرِكُمْ آبَاءَكُمْ أَوْ أَشَدَّ ذِكْرًا فَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا وَمَا لَهُ فِي الْآخِرَةِ مِنْ خَلَاقٍ","translation_text":"When you have completed your rites, remember God as much as you remember your own fathers, or even more. God was aware that you were betraying yourselves, so He turned to you in mercy and pardoned you: now you can lie with them- seek what God has ordained for you- eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct from the black. Then fast until nightfall. Do not lie with them during the nights of your devotional retreat in the mosques: these are the bounds set by God, so do not go near them. In this way God makes His messages clear to people, that they may guard themselves against doing wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"afe98c16-3910-4528-94cf-d1e5443d383f","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حلل","wordgroup_id":"85b7937f-2561-4c34-b5f7-c6c27e8e08d8"},{"id":102841,"root":"حلل","root_slug":"Hll","surah":2,"verse":196,"word_index":17,"arabic_text":"وَأَتِمُّوا الْحَجَّ وَالْعُمْرَةَ لِلَّهِ فَإِنْ أُحْصِرْتُمْ فَمَا اسْتَيْسَرَ مِنَ الْهَدْيِ وَلَا تَحْلِقُوا رُءُوسَكُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَبْلُغَ الْهَدْيُ مَحِلَّهُ فَمَن كَانَ مِنكُم مَّرِيضًا أَوْ بِهِ أَذًى مِّن رَّأْسِهِ فَفِدْيَةٌ مِّن صِيَامٍ أَوْ صَدَقَةٍ أَوْ نُسُكٍ فَإِذَا أَمِنتُمْ فَمَن تَمَتَّعَ بِالْعُمْرَةِ إِلَى الْحَجِّ فَمَا اسْتَيْسَرَ مِنَ الْهَدْيِ فَمَن لَّمْ يَجِدْ فَصِيَامُ ثَلَاثَةِ أَيَّامٍ فِي الْحَجِّ وَسَبْعَةٍ إِذَا رَجَعْتُمْ تِلْكَ عَشَرَةٌ كَامِلَةٌ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَن لَّمْ يَكُنْ أَهْلُهُ حَاضِرِي الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ شَدِيدُ الْعِقَابِ","translation_text":"Complete the pilgrimages, major and minor, for the sake of God. If you are prevented &#91;from doing so&#93;, then &#91;send&#93; whatever offering for sacrifice you can afford, and do not shave your headsuntil the offering has reached the place of sacrifice. If any of you is ill, or has an ailment of the scalp, he should compensate by fasting, or feeding the poor, or offering sacrifice. When you are in safety, anyone wishing to take a break between the minor pilgrimage and the major one must make whatever offering he can afford. If he lacks the means, he should fast for three days during the pilgrimage, and seven days on his return, making ten days in all. This applies to those whose household is not near the Sacred Mosque. Always be mindful of God, and be aware that He is stern in His retribution","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"afe98c16-3910-4528-94cf-d1e5443d383f","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حلل","wordgroup_id":"85b7937f-2561-4c34-b5f7-c6c27e8e08d8"},{"id":103328,"root":"حلل","root_slug":"Hll","surah":2,"verse":228,"word_index":7,"arabic_text":"وَالْمُطَلَّقَاتُ يَتَرَبَّصْنَ بِأَنفُسِهِنَّ ثَلَاثَةَ قُرُوءٍ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَهُنَّ أَن يَكْتُمْنَ مَا خَلَقَ اللَّهُ فِي أَرْحَامِهِنَّ إِن كُنَّ يُؤْمِنَّ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ وَبُعُولَتُهُنَّ أَحَقُّ بِرَدِّهِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ إِنْ أَرَادُوا إِصْلَاحًا وَلَهُنَّ مِثْلُ الَّذِي عَلَيْهِنَّ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ وَلِلرِّجَالِ عَلَيْهِنَّ دَرَجَةٌ وَاللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ","translation_text":"Divorced women must wait for three monthly periods before remarrying, and, if they really believe in God and the Last Day, it is not lawful for them to conceal what God has created in their wombs: their husbands would do better to take them back during this period, provided they wish to put things right. Wives have &#91;rights&#93; similar to their &#91;obligations&#93;, according to what is recognized to be fair, and husbands have a degree &#91;of right&#93; over them: &#91;both should remember that&#93; God is almighty and wise","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"afe98c16-3910-4528-94cf-d1e5443d383f","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حلل","wordgroup_id":"85b7937f-2561-4c34-b5f7-c6c27e8e08d8"},{"id":103356,"root":"حلل","root_slug":"Hll","surah":2,"verse":229,"word_index":9,"arabic_text":"الطَّلَاقُ مَرَّتَانِ فَإِمْسَاكٌ بِمَعْرُوفٍ أَوْ تَسْرِيحٌ بِإِحْسَانٍ وَلَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمْ أَن تَأْخُذُوا مِمَّا آتَيْتُمُوهُنَّ شَيْئًا إِلَّا أَن يَخَافَا أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَإِنْ خِفْتُمْ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا فِيمَا افْتَدَتْ بِهِ تِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ فَلَا تَعْتَدُوهَا وَمَن يَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ اللَّهِ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ","translation_text":"Divorce can happen twice, and &#91;each time&#93; wives either be kept on in an acceptable manner or released in a good way. It is not lawful for you to take back anything that you have given &#91;your wives&#93;, except where both fear that they cannot maintain &#91;the marriage&#93; within the bounds set by God: if you &#91;arbiters&#93; suspect that the couple may not be able to do this, then there will be no blame on either of them if the woman opts to give something for her release. These are the bounds set by God: do not overstep them. It is those who overstep God&rsquo;s bounds who are doing wrong","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"afe98c16-3910-4528-94cf-d1e5443d383f","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"حلل","wordgroup_id":"85b7937f-2561-4c34-b5f7-c6c27e8e08d8"},{"id":103378,"root":"حلل","root_slug":"Hll","surah":2,"verse":230,"word_index":4,"arabic_text":"فَإِن طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا تَحِلُّ لَهُ مِن بَعْدُ حَتَّىٰ تَنكِحَ زَوْجًا غَيْرَهُ فَإِن طَلَّقَهَا فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَا أَن يَتَرَاجَعَا إِن ظَنَّا أَن يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ اللَّهِ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ يُبَيِّنُهَا لِقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ","translation_text":"If a husband re-divorces his wife after the second divorce, she will not be lawful for him until she has taken another husband; if that one divorces her, there will be no blame if she and the first husband return to one another, provided they feel that they can keep within the bounds set by God. Do not let your hatred for the people who barred you from the Sacred Mosque induce you to break the law: help one another to do what is right and good; do not help one another towards sin and hostility. If there are only daughters, two or more should share two-thirds of the inheritance, if one, she should have half. Parents inherit a sixth each if the deceased leaves children; if he leaves no children and his parents are his sole heirs, his mother has a third, unless he has brothers, in which case she has a sixth. &#91;In all cases, the distribution comes&#93; after payment of any bequests or debts. قُلْتُمْ يَا مُوسَىٰ لَن نَّصْبِرَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامٍ وَاحِدٍ فَادْعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ يُخْرِجْ لَنَا مِمَّا تُنبِتُ الْأَرْضُ مِن بَقْلِهَا وَقِثَّائِهَا وَفُومِهَا وَعَدَسِهَا وَبَصَلِهَا قَالَ أَتَسْتَبْدِلُونَ الَّذِي هُوَ أَدْنَىٰ بِالَّذِي هُوَ خَيْرٌ اهْبِطُوا مِصْرًا فَإِنَّ لَكُم مَّا سَأَلْتُمْ وَضُرِبَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ الذِّلَّةُ وَالْمَسْكَنَةُ وَبَاءُوا بِغَضَبٍ مِّنَ اللَّهِ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَانُوا يَكْفُرُونَ بِآيَاتِ اللَّهِ وَيَقْتُلُونَ النَّبِيِّينَ بِغَيْرِ الْحَقِّ ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا عَصَوا وَّكَانُوا يَعْتَدُونَ","translation_text":"Remember when you said, &lsquo;Moses, we cannot bear to eat only one kind of food, so pray to your Lord to bring out for us some of the earth&rsquo;s produce, its herbs and cucumbers, its garlic, lentils, and onions.&rsquo; He said, &lsquo;Would you exchange better for worse? Go to Egypt and there you will find what you have asked for.&rsquo; They were struck with humiliation and wretchedness, and they incurred the wrath of God because they persistently rejected His messages and killed prophets contrary to all that is right. All this was because they disobeyed and were lawbreakers","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"98c20044-d9d2-4110-a68f-f60b208db1cd","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"بوأ","wordgroup_id":"c80ba868-80b6-4fcb-af46-2f27b81222bf"},{"id":101498,"root":"بوأ","root_slug":"bwa","surah":2,"verse":90,"word_index":21,"arabic_text":"بِئْسَمَا اشْتَرَوْا بِهِ أَنفُسَهُمْ أَن يَكْفُرُوا بِمَا أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ بَغْيًا أَن يُنَزِّلَ اللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَاءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ فَبَاءُوا بِغَضَبٍ عَلَىٰ غَضَبٍ وَلِلْكَافِرِينَ عَذَابٌ مُّهِينٌ","translation_text":"Low indeed is the price for which they have sold their souls by denying the God-sent truth, out of envy that God should send His bounty to any of His servants He pleases. If you are prevented &#91;from doing so&#93;, then &#91;send&#93; whatever offering for sacrifice you can afford, and do not shave your headsuntil the offering has reached the place of sacrifice. If any of you is ill, or has an ailment of the scalp, he should compensate by fasting, or feeding the poor, or offering sacrifice. When you are in safety, anyone wishing to take a break between the minor pilgrimage and the major one must make whatever offering he can afford. If he lacks the means, he should fast for three days during the pilgrimage, and seven days on his return, making ten days in all. This applies to those whose household is not near the Sacred Mosque. But not Iblis, who refused and was arrogant: he was one of the disobedient","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"ef1bdde3-ae90-4952-883c-a6f6901eca64","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ملك","wordgroup_id":"4b6551b4-bfc7-4f17-bdcf-7ee6ab910fc9"},{"id":101602,"root":"ملك","root_slug":"mlk","surah":2,"verse":98,"word_index":5,"arabic_text":"مَن كَانَ عَدُوًّا لِّلَّهِ وَمَلَائِكَتِهِ وَرُسُلِهِ وَجِبْرِيلَ وَمِيكَالَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ عَدُوٌّ لِّلْكَافِرِينَ","translation_text":"if anyone is an enemy of God, His angels and His messengers, of Gabriel and Michael, then God is certainly the enemy of such disbelievers.&rsquo;","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"ef1bdde3-ae90-4952-883c-a6f6901eca64","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ملك","wordgroup_id":"4b6551b4-bfc7-4f17-bdcf-7ee6ab910fc9"},{"id":101644,"root":"ملك","root_slug":"mlk","surah":2,"verse":102,"word_index":20,"arabic_text":"وَاتَّبَعُوا مَا تَتْلُو الشَّيَاطِينُ عَلَىٰ مُلْكِ سُلَيْمَانَ وَمَا كَفَرَ سُلَيْمَانُ وَلَـٰكِنَّ الشَّيَاطِينَ كَفَرُوا يُعَلِّمُونَ النَّاسَ السِّحْرَ وَمَا أُنزِلَ عَلَى الْمَلَكَيْنِ بِبَابِلَ هَارُوتَ وَمَارُوتَ وَمَا يُعَلِّمَانِ مِنْ أَحَدٍ حَتَّىٰ يَقُولَا إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ فِتْنَةٌ فَلَا تَكْفُرْ فَيَتَعَلَّمُونَ مِنْهُمَا مَا يُفَرِّقُونَ بِهِ بَيْنَ الْمَرْءِ وَزَوْجِهِ وَمَا هُم بِضَارِّينَ بِهِ مِنْ أَحَدٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ وَيَتَعَلَّمُونَ مَا يَضُرُّهُمْ وَلَا يَنفَعُهُمْ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمُوا لَمَنِ اشْتَرَاهُ مَا لَهُ فِي الْآخِرَةِ مِنْ خَلَاقٍ وَلَبِئْسَ مَا شَرَوْا بِهِ أَنفُسَهُمْ لَوْ كَانُوا يَعْلَمُونَ","translation_text":"and followed what the evil ones had fabricated about the Kingdom of Solomon instead. Not that Solomon himself was a disbeliever; it was the evil ones who were disbelievers. They taught people witchcraft and what was revealed in Babylon to the two angels Harut and Marut. Yet these two never taught anyone without first warning him, &lsquo;We are sent only to tempt- do not disbelieve.&rsquo; From these two, they learned what can cause discord between man and wife, although they harm no one with it except by God&rsquo;s leave. They learned what harmed them, not what benefited them, knowing full well that whoever gained &#91;this knowledge&#93; would lose any share in the Hereafter. The truly good are those who believe in God and the Last Day, in the angels, the Scripture, and the prophets; who give away some of their wealth, however much they cherish it, to their relatives, to orphans, the needy, travellers and beggars, and to liberate those in bondage; those who keep up the prayer and pay the prescribed alms; who keep pledges whenever they make them; who are steadfast in misfortune, adversity, and times of danger. These are the ones who are true, and it is they who are aware of God","translator":"Abdel Haleem","analysis_id":"ef1bdde3-ae90-4952-883c-a6f6901eca64","source":"qpip","analysis_root":"ملك","wordgroup_id":"4b6551b4-bfc7-4f17-bdcf-7ee6ab910fc9"},{"id":103026,"root":"ملك","root_slug":"mlk","surah":2,"verse":210,"word_index":11,"arabic_text":"هَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَأْتِيَهُمُ اللَّهُ فِي ظُلَلٍ مِّنَ الْغَمَامِ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ وَقُضِيَ الْأَمْرُ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ الْأُمُورُ","translation_text":"Are these people waiting for God to come to them in the shadows of the clouds, together with the angels? No one should be burdened with more than they can bear: no mother shall be made to suffer harm on account of her child, nor any father on account of his. The same duty is incumbent on the father&rsquo;s heir. If, by mutual consent and consultation, the couple wish to wean &#91;the child&#93;, they will not be blamed, nor will there be any blame if you wish to engage a wet nurse, provided you pay as agreed in a fair manner. in the alternation of night and day; in the ships that sail the seas with goods for people; in the water which God sends down from the sky to give life to the earth when it has been barren, scattering all kinds of creatures over it;
